title: Driver's licenses and vehicle registrations
dataVerified: Name, DOB, address, photo, vehicle VIN, license plate
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Police/hotels/bars verify authenticity. Barcode + OCR-to-hash complement each other. Prevents fake IDs. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
